name: Power Overwhelming Prologue
description: Witch's bullets party- Power Overwhelming, a fast-paced dungeon shooting game with Top-Down view.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows Vista/Windows 7/Windows 8 Processor: 1.7+ GHz or better Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Radeon HD5450 or better; 256 MB or higher DirectX: Version 9.0c Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 1136 MB available space Sound Card: 100% DirectX9.0c compatible sound card and drivers
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
